description: 'Three in a Barn' - The old barn doesn't look luxurious but it's shelter for the night.  Larry Atkins, a traveling salesman, is grateful for that much at least. Just then the barn door opens and a suprised Larry looks up to see tall muscular Barry...who's the spitting image of Rock ... only older.  It suddenly hits him that the two studs must be father and son!  And what a team they are!  The father whips out a prong that's even bigger than the guy's and proceeds to give both Rock and Larry a few pointers on how to train a stud to service a hot cock.
title: Take Ten
